text: X is an American punk rock band formed in Los Angeles. The original members are vocalist Exene Cervenka, vocalist-bassist John Doe, guitarist Billy Zoom and drummer D. J. Bonebrake. The band released seven studio albums from 1980 to 1993. After a period of inactivity during the mid-to-late 1990s, X reunited in the early 2000s and continued to tour.In June 2024, X announced a final album and farewell tour. Category:American rock bands Category:American musical groups Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: X (American band)
